challenges.title: Valid Parentheses
challenges.description:
You are given a string consisting of the following characters: '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']'.

The inputted string is valid if and only if:
  1. Every open bracket is closed by the same type of close bracket.
  2. Open brackets are closed in the correct order.
  3. Every close bracket has a corresponding open bracket of the same type.

Return 'Valid' if it is a valid string, and 'Invalid' otherwise.
